blogs.title: saw a sherwin williams truck
blogs.content: I was driving on the highway passing a Sherwin-Williams semi truck and got amped. The truck itself was painted a bold blue with red cursive lettering. The logo fashioned to the side of the truck, standing equal my own height, was a bucket of red paint pouring onto the Earth. A cartoon depiction of their motto, 'Cover the Earth'. I was excited. I sped up next to him, pulling my arm up and down. A signal requesting him to blow his horn. I don't even know if he obliged as I blew past him on the expressway, for some reason, completely happy for the next 10 minutes.
